con:restRequest.name: ProcessMarketingEventCertTrxn

con:elements.con:expectedValue: All enrolled members with an active profile status
Earn a Certificate on a Transaction
Earn a certificate for spending a minimum amount

SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, null AS total_points, ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day, null AS avg_points_per_day, ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers, null AS projected_total_points FROM ( SELECT profile_id, {{OFFERS_QUERY}} FROM t_act_transaction WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND (transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP') OR (transaction_type_code IN ('RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null)) AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}} {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} GROUP BY profile_id )

"FormulaName": "ROUND_ELIGIBLE", "Status": "A" }, "MomentQualifyingRule": { "MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "EventType": "PurchaseTxn", "OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}", "RuleEquationUI": "PurchaseTxn.ProgramCode ==\"{{PROGRAMCODE}}\" && {{MOMENT_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_PART}} && (PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible >={{MIN_TXN_AMT}})", "MomentCap": [{{MAX_OFFERS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}{{MAX_POINTS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}] }, "Status": "A" } ] }, "Status": "A", "BestOfferIndicator": false, "AdvancedModeIndicator": false, "IsTestUser": false, "ReleaseState": "P" }

SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points, ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day, ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day, ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers, ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points FROM ( SELECT profile_id, {{OFFERS_QUERY}} FROM t_act_transaction WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP','RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}} {{AUDIENCE_QUERY}} GROUP BY PROFILE_ID )

2C%22attributes%22%3A%5B%5D%7D%2C%7B%22name%22%3A%22%22%2C%22type%22%3A%22%22%2C%22objType%22%3A%22drools%22%2C%22id%22%3A%22%22%2C%22value%22%3A%22String.valueOf(new%20Double(Math.round({{POINT_AMT_PER_ELIG_DOLLAR}}*%24PurchaseTxn.getTransactionEligible())))%22%2C%22isSelect%22%3Afalse%2C%22funcName%22%3A%22%22%2C%22filterType%22%3A%22%22%2C%22drools%22%3A%22%22%2C%22collectionAttribute%22%3Afalse%2C%22refId%22%3A%22%22%7D%5D",

},
"MomentQualifyingRule": {
"MomentCode": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
"EventType": "PurchaseTxn",
"OfferName": "{{MOMENTCODE}}",
"RuleEquationUI": "PurchaseTxn.ProgramCode ==\"{{PROGRAMCODE}}\" && {{MOMENT_ELIGIBILITY_CRITERIA_PART}} && (PurchaseTxn.TransactionEligible >={{MIN_TXN_AMT}})",
"MomentCap": [{{MAX_OFFERS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}{{MAX_POINTS_PER_MEMBER_TEMPLATE}}]

"Status": "A",
"BestOfferIndicator": false,
"AdvancedModeIndicator": false,
"IsTestUser": false,
"ReleaseState": "P"
} ", "SimulationQueryTemplate": "SELECT COUNT(distinct profile_id) AS unique_customers, SUM(profile_trans) AS total_offers, SUM(profile_points) AS total_points,
ceil(SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_offers_per_day,
ceil(SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) AS avg_points_per_day,
ceil((SUM(profile_trans)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_offers,
ceil((SUM(profile_points)/{{SIMULATION_DATE_DIFF}}) * {{OFFER_DATE_DIFF}}) AS projected_total_points
FROM
(
SELECT profile_id,
{{OFFERS_QUERY}}
FROM t_act_transaction
WHERE program_code = :ProgramCode AND status IN ('A','P') AND transaction_type_code IN ('PR','EP','RT','ER','EX') AND act_transaction_xref_id is null
AND transaction_date >= :SIMULATION_START_DATE AND transaction_date < :SIMULATION_END_DATE AND eligible_revenue >= {{MIN_TXN_AMT}}
{{AUDIENCE_QUERY}}
GROUP BY PROFILE_ID
